meta.description: Synthesizable facts about Kreatywna Fala - derivable from multiple documents but not explicitly stated in any single document. Tests RAG system ability to aggregate and infer company characteristics.
meta.purpose: Qualitative evaluation of system's ability to understand implicit/emergent company attributes from distributed information

headcount.derivation: Count unique team members appearing across documents

location.derivation: Infer from client meeting locations, local references

active_clients_typical.derivation: Count clients mentioned as active in status reports
source_evidence: Throughout the year: Browar (A), ModaNet (B), Smakosz (C), City project (E), MaszBud in pipeline (D)

account_manager_structure.value: Senior AM for difficult/large clients, Junior AM for stable/smaller
account_manager_structure.derivation: Observe handover patterns and client assignments
source_evidence: ModaNet handover from Boryna (junior) to Kmicic (senior) when relationship troubled
Smakosz stayed with Boryna after stabilization

reporting_frequency.value: Monthly standard, weekly for troubled accounts
source_evidence: Weekly statusy wprowadzone dla ModaNet po kryzysie
Weekly statusy dla Smakosz po reklamacji
Smakosz - communication gap led to complaint
City project - timeline pressure from approvals

internal_language.value: Polish, informal (per-tu basis among most colleagues)

source_evidence: Team discusses but Zbigniew decides (ModaNet absorb cost)
Senior AM has autonomy within limits
Absorbed ModaNet overrun to preserve relationship
Open discussion of problems in internal emails
Delayed Smakosz presentation to improve quality

changes_during_period.change: Introduction of Scope Change Request (SCR) form
Shift to weekly client statuses for at-risk accounts
Content marketing strategy for lead generation
changes_during_period.trigger: Thin pipeline, need for inbound leads

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Ile osób pracuje w agencji Kreatywna Fala? Wymień ich imiona i stanowiska.
evaluation_questions.question_en: How many people work at Kreatywna Fala agency? List their names and positions.

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Jaki jest typowy zakres miesięcznego wynagrodzenia (retainera) dla klientów agencji?
evaluation_questions.question_en: What is the typical range of monthly retainer fees for agency clients?

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Jakie procesy lub procedury agencja wdrożyła w odpowiedzi na problemy z projektami? Podaj przykłady.
evaluation_questions.question_en: What processes or procedures did the agency implement in response to project problems? Give examples.

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Jak agencja podchodzi do trudnych sytuacji z klientami - jakie są typowe metody rozwiązywania konfliktów?
evaluation_questions.question_en: How does the agency approach difficult client situations - what are typical conflict resolution methods?

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Jakie wartości firmowe można wywnioskować z dokumentów? Na podstawie czego?
evaluation_questions.question_en: What company values can be inferred from the documents? Based on what evidence?

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Który klient ma najdłuższą historię współpracy z agencją i jak długo trwa ta relacja?
evaluation_questions.question_en: Which client has the longest history with the agency and how long has this relationship lasted?

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Jaka jest struktura zespołu account managerów i jak przypisywani są klienci?
evaluation_questions.question_en: What is the account manager team structure and how are clients assigned?

evaluation_questions.question_pl: Jakie są najczęstsze problemy w projektach agencji i jak często występują?
evaluation_questions.question_en: What are the most common problems in agency projects and how often do they occur?
